Name: Eternal Warrior
i3: Gain Minor Aegis at all times, reducing your damage taken from Dungeon and Trial Monsters by 5%.
i5: When you die, you instead turn into a statue for 3 seconds and gain 200 Ultimate. While a statue you are immune to all negative effects but can still be healed. This effect can occur once every 10 minutes. Adds 4% Healing Taken.

Name: Lunar Bastion
i3: Gain Minor Aegis at all times, reducing your damage taken from Dungeon and Trial Monsters by 5%.
i5: When you activate a synergy, you create a lunar blessing underneath you for 10 seconds. The blessing grants a damage shield every 2 seconds that absorbs 2399 damage for you and your allies within 8 meters.

Name: Almalexia's Mercy
i5: When you take damage, you have a 20% chance to heal you and your allies within 7 meters of you for 2429 Health. This effect can occur once every 3 seconds.

Name: The Arch-Mage
i5: When you deal damage with a fully-charged Heavy Attack, you restore 834 Magicka.

Name: Buffer of the Swift
i4: Reduces your damage taken from Players by 5%.
i5: When you take damage from a spell, you have a 10% chance to gain a damage shield that absorbs 2580 damage for 6 seconds. This effect can occur once every 4 seconds.

Name: Curse Eater
i5: Reduces the duration of all negative effects applied to you by 20%.

Name: Desert Rose
i5: When you take damage, you have a 10% to restore 2408 Magicka. This effect can occur once every 1 second.

Name: Light of Cyrodiil
i5: While you are casting or channeling an ability, your damage taken is reduced by 15%.

Name: Robes of Alteration Mastery
i5: Reduces the cost of all your abilities by 6%.

Name: Robes of Transmutation
i5: When you heal a target with a healing over time ability, grant them 1304 Critical Resistance for 20 seconds.

Name: Vicious Death
i5: When you kill a Player, they violently explode for 15815 Flame Damage to all other enemies in a 4 meter radius.

Name: Eagle Eye
i3: Increases the range of your Bow abilities by 3 meters.

Name: Vengeance Leech
i3: When you kill an enemy, you heal for 1505 Health and restore 1505 Magicka and Stamina.

Name: Hawk's Eye
i5: Reduces the cost and increases the damage of your Bow abilities by 5%.

Name: Kyne's Kiss
i5: When you deal direct damage with a Bow ability, you have a 10% chance to heal for 1216 Health and restore 1216 Stamina.

Name: Leki's Focus
i5: Reduces your damage taken from area of effect abilities by 25%, but the damage and healing of your own area of effect abilities is also reduced by 25%.

Name: Marksman's Crest
i5: Reduces the cost of your Stamina abilities by 5% and increases the damage of your Bow abilities against Players by 8%.

Name: The Morag Tong
i5: When you deal direct damage, you cause the enemy to take 10% more damage from all Poison Damage abilities for 5 seconds.

Name: Sentry
i5: Increases the radius you can detect Sneaking enemies by 50%. Increases your damage done to Sneaking enemeis by 20%.

Name: Shadow Walker
i5: While you are Sneaking or invisible and are not moving, heal for 2150 Health and restore 2150 Stamina every 1 second.

Name: Shield of the Valiant
i4: Reduces your damage taken from Players by 5%.
i5: Reduces the cost of Break Free by 40%.

Name: Ward of Cyrodiil
i3: Increases your Mounted Movement Speed by 15%.
i5: Increases the amount of damage you block by 8%.

Name: Blessing of the Potentates
i3: Reduces the cost of your Ultimate abilites by 10%.

Name: Affliction
i5: When you deal damage, you have a 50% chance to deal an additional 2838 Disease Damage. This effect can occur once every 4 seconds.

Name: Alessian Order
i5: Increases the immunity to disabling effects after using Break Free by 3 seconds.

Name: Bastion of the Heartland
i4: Reduces your damage taken from Players by 5%.
i5: Reduces your damage taken from Siege Weapons and Player Area of Effect abilities by 20%.

Name: Beckoning Steel
i5: You have a 40% chance to intercept any projectile cast on an ally within 5 meters of you.

Name: Crest of Cyrodiil
i5: When you deal melee damage, you apply Major Defile to the enemy for 5 seconds, reducing their healing received by 30%. This effect can occur once every 5 seconds.

Name: Elf Bane
i5: Increases the duration of your Flame Damage abilities by 2 seconds.

Name: Fasalla's Guile
i5: When you take direct damage or damage from a ground-targeted attack, you reduce the attacker's healing received by 50% for 2 seconds.

Name: Juggernaut
i5: When you take damage while under 30% Health, heal for 18060 Health. This effect can occur once every 1 minute.

Name: Ravager
i5: When you deal melee damage, you have a 8% chance to increase your Weapon Damage by 645 for 10 seconds.

Name: Warrior's Fury
i5: When you take Critical Damage, your Weapon Damage is increased by 30 for 6 seconds, stacking up to 25 times.

Name: Galerion's Revenge
i5: When you deal damage with a Light of Heavy Attack, you put a Mark of Revenge on the enemy for 15 seconds. After stacking 6 Marks of Revenge on an enemy they detonate for 4730 Magic Damage.

Name: Meritorious Service
i5: When you case a Support ability, you increase the Physical and Spell Resistance of up to 4 friendly targets with 10 meters by 3010 for 2 minutes.

Name: Phoenix
i5: When you die, you instead become immune to all negative effects and healing for 3 seconds. When the effect ends, you heal for 17200 Health and explode for 8600 Flame Damage to all enemies within 8 meters. This effect can occur once every 10 minutes.

Name: Powerful Assault
i5: When you cast an Assault ability, you increase the Weapon and Spell Damage of up to 4 friendly targets within 10 meters by 164 for 15 seconds.

Name: Shield Breaker
i5: When you deal damage with a Light or Heavy Attack against a Player with a damage shield, you deal an additional 2150 Oblivion Damage to them.

Name: Vicecanon of Venom
i5: When you deal Critical Damage to an enemy from Sneak, you inject a leeching poison that deals 13760 Poison Damage over 15 seconds to them and heals you for 100% of the damage done.

Name: Black Rose
i5: Increases your Weapon and Spell Damage by 154. Increases the Magicka and Stamina restored from the Constitution passive ability by 40%.

Name: Reactive Armor
i5: While you are affected by a disabling effect, your damage taken is reduced by 35%.

Name: Thews of the Harbinger
i5: When you block a direct damage attack, you deal damage to your attacker equal to 4% of your current Health.

Name: Imperial Physique
i4: Adds 129 Weapon Damage. Adds 129 Spell Damage
i5: While you are in Imperial City, you tap into the power of the Tel Var Stones you are carrying, increasing your Health, Magicka, and Stamina by 1032. While you have a 4x Tel Var Stone multiplier this effect is increased by 600%.

Name: Death's Wind
i5: If struck by a melee attack while below 35% Health, nearby enemies are knocked back and stunned for 4 seconds. This effect can only happen once every 30 seconds.

Name: Night's Silence
i5: Ignore Movement Speed penalty while Stealthing.

Name: Ashen Grip
i5: 10% chance to breathe fire for 1397 Flame Damage on melee hits. This effect can occur once every 4 seconds

Name: Torug's Pact
i5: Reduce weapon enchantment’s internal cooldown by 1 second. Increases enchantment potency by 30%.

Name: Trial by Fire
i5: When you take elemental damage, gain 7727 Resistance to that element for 4 seconds. You can only be resistant to one element at a time.

Name: Twilight's Embrace
i5: When you are healed, gain 10% additional healing.

Name: Armor of the Seducer
i5: Reduce the Magicka cost of abilities by 8%.

Name: Magnus' Gift
i5: 8% Chance to negate the Magicka cost of a spell.

Name: Hist Bark
i5: Gain Major Evasion while blocking, increasing Dodge chance by 20%.

Name: Whitestrake's Retribution
i5: If wearers Health is below 30%, gain a 10320 Damage Shield for 8 seconds. This effect can occur no more than once per 15 seconds.

Name: Alessia’s Bulwark
i5: Being damaged by a melee attack has a 15% chance to reduce attacker’s Weapon Damage by 10% for 5 seconds.

Name: Kvatch Gladiator
i5: Your Light and Heavy Attacks deal an additional 690 Weapon Damage to targets below 25% Health.

Name: Noble’s Conquest
i5: Interrupting an enemy causes them to take 8% increased damage for 5 seconds and heals you for 4300.

Name: Song of Lamae
i5: When Health drops below 30%, deal 3870 Magic Damage to the attacker and recover 3870 Health. This can only happen once every 30 seconds.

Name: Tava’s Favor
i5: When you dodge an attack you receive the blessing of Tava and gain 9 Ultimate over 3 seconds.

Name: Vampire’s Kiss
i5: Bow attacks have a 10% chance to restore 1216 Stamina and Health. This effect will not proc off damage over time attacks.

Name: Hunding’s Rage
i5: Adds 299 Weapon Damage.

Name: Law of Julianos
i5: Adds 299 Spell Damage.

Name: Night Mother’s Gaze
i5: Critical attacks also reduce the target’s Physical Resistance by 2580 for 6 seconds.

Name: Willow’s Path
i5: Increase all recovery in combat by 15%.

Name: Clever Alchemist
i4: Adds 129 Weapon Damage. Adds 129 Spell Damage.
i5: When you drink a potion you feel a rush of energy, gaining 661 Weapon and Spell Damage for 15 seconds.

Name: Redistributor
i5: When you heal yourself while at full Health, heal a nearby ally for 2347. This effect can happen once every 3 seconds.

Name: Varen’s Legacy
i5: 10% chance on Block that the next Area of Effect Attack you use will deal an additional 3450 Damage.

Name: Eyes of Mara
i5: Reduce the Magicka cost of restoration staff abilities by 12%.

Name: Kagrenac’s Hope
i5: Decrease time to resurrect an ally by 25% and restore 1720. Also, decrease time to resurrect an ally by 25% and restore 1720 Magicka when you successfully resurrect an ally. Adds 222 Spell Damage.

Name: Oblivion’s Foe
i5: Increase the damage of your Soul Trap abilities by 100%.

Name: Orgnum’s Scales
i5: If below 60% Health, increase Health Recovery by 50%.

Name: Shalidor’s Curse
i5: While you are below 50% Health, light attacks restore 559 Health.

Name: Spectre’s Eye
i5: Gain Major Evasion for 3 seconds after casting a spell that costs Magicka. This effect can apply once every 6 seconds.

Name: Way of the Arena
i5: Reduce cost of Break Free by 40%.

Name: Armor Master
i5: While you have an Armor Ability slotted, increase your Maximum Health by 5%. When you activate an Armor Ability you gain 5332 Physical and Spell Resistance for 10 seconds.

Name: Eternal Hunt
i5: When you use Roll Dodge you leave behind a rune that detonates when enemies come close, dealing 7701 Poison Damage and immobilizing them for 1.5 seconds.

Name: Morkuldin
i5: 10% chance when using a Light or Heavy Attack to summon an animated weapon to attack your enemies for 15 seconds. The animated weapon’s basic attacks deal 4313 Physical Damage.

Name: Pelinal’s Aptitude
i5: Your Weapon Damage and Spell Damage both become the highest of the two values.

Name: Twice-Born Star
i5: Allows you to have two Mundus Stone Boons at the same time.
